title: PODCAST: The cost of concussions
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday May 29, 2014
contentencoded:
There's a big rush to reduce concussions in sports. But the technology has yet to catch up with the demand. 

Ever wonder why public radio sometimes feels a little like a classroom? Well there's a reason. More from our new LearningCurve series.
teaser: A look at the markets, the challenge of reducing concussions and more from our LearningCurve series.
description: A look at the markets, the challenge of reducing concussions and more from our LearningCurve series.
